subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ursula Files/for keith.wav 
  Uploaded by : kalinu@... <kalinu@...> 
  Description : this is a message for my brother is friend past away this summer sounds like tell your brother I said hi then I lose the middle the end sounds like don't take it so hard 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ursula%20Files/for%20keith.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:

Regards,

kalinu@... <kalinu@...>
